text: Hugh Wyndham may refer to: * Sir Hugh Wyndham (1602–1684), English Judge of the Common Pleas and Baron of the Exchequer *Hugh Wyndham (Minehead MP) (c. 1624–71), MP for Minehead 1661–71 * Sir Hugh Wyndham (diplomat) (1836–1916), British diplomat, minister to Serbia, Brazil and Romania * Hugh Wyndham, 4th Baron Leconfield (1877–1963), British peer, politician and author
title: Hugh Wyndham (disambiguation)
